about.title: About
about.part1: <0>HKDSE</0> is the university entrance exam in Hong Kong. This website aggregates candidates' results in HKDSE Category A subjects as released by <1>HKEAA</1>.
about.part2: This website is installable as an offline app on mobile devices. To see the latest version of the website, you may need to refresh the page and restart the app.
about.part3: HKEAA has yet to upload data for 2022 HKDSE. (24/12/2022)

heading.subject: Subject
heading.noFulfillingAttendanceRequirement: No. of candidates fulfilling attendance requirement

table.specify: Specify either subject or year to see results.
table.mathPS: Mathematics Compulsory Part and Mathematics Extended Part are counted as one subject. When candidates have results in both parts, the better of the two will be selected.
